text:
Umbel | Austin, TX

Umbel is a high-energy, fast-growing startup based in Austin, Texas, helping companies ethically unlock the value hidden in their consumer data. We empower some of the coolest clients to build thriving, sustainable businesses with our leading-edge Digital Genome technology. With the Umbel platform, our clients can understand and build relationships with their customers in a way that has never before been possible. Current job openings in Austin include:

- Front End Developer

- Cassandra Database Engineer

- Platform Engineer

Find out more and apply at https://www.umbel.com/engineering
